Planar Gateway.name: Planar Gateway
Planar Gateway.flavor: You create a rift between the planes, drawing raw power through it that tumbles your enemies about like skittles.

bonusPower.name: Planar Gateway Attack
bonusPower.flavor: You create a rift between the planes, drawing raw power through it that tumbles your enemies about like skittles.
bonusPower.requirement: The Planar Gateway power must be active to use this power.
bonusPower.trigger: A creature starts its turn adjacent to the planar gateway or enters a square adjacent to the planar gateway
bonusPower.target: The triggering creature in the burst
bonusPower.onHit: 3d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and you slide the target 3 squares.

Planar Gateway.effect: You conjure a planar gateway that occupies 1 square within range and lasts until the end of your next turn. You can use the Planar Gateway Attack power, using the gatewayâ€™s square as the origin square.

Enduring Summons.name: Enduring Summons
Enduring Summons.flavor: You call on the power of the planes to surge through your summoned creature, ensuring its survival.
Enduring Summons.effect: The target regains hit points equal to your healing surge value.

Summon Bonded Protector.name: Summon Bonded Protector
Summon Bonded Protector.flavor: You call a massive humanoid-shaped statue of metal and stone that pounds your foes and forces them away from you.
Summon Bonded Protector.effect: You summon a Large bonded protector in an unoccupied 2-square-by-2-square space within range. The bonded protector has reach 2 and a speed of 5. It has a +4 bonus to AC and a +4 bonus to Will. You can give the bonded protector the following special commands.
Summon Bonded Protector.standardAction: Close blast 3; targets each creature in the blast; Intelligence vs. Reflex; 2d4 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Summon Bonded Protector.opportunityAttack: Melee 1; targets one creature; Intelligence vs. Reflex; 2d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone. The bonded protector can make this opportunity attack against a creature that attacks you or that attacks a creature you summoned.
Summon Bonded Protector.minorAction: You and the bonded protector swap positions.
